hero.title: About Jay Brass
hero.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 2009
hero.description: Jay Brass has been a trusted manufacturer of precision brass components for the automotive industry since 2009. We combine advanced semi-automatic machinery with expert craftsmanship to deliver high-quality automotive parts that meet the most demanding specifications.

meta.title: Jay Brass - Precision Automotive Components Manufacturing
meta.description: Leading precision brass component manufacturer for automotive industry, delivering high-quality parts with advanced manufacturing capabilities since 2009.

items.content: Jay Brass is a leading precision brass component manufacturer specializing in automotive parts since 2009. We leverage advanced semi-automatic machinery and expert craftsmanship to deliver high-quality brass components that meet the most stringent industry standards.
